meanings.definition: A soft murmuring or rustling sound, especially of the wind in trees.
meanings.sent1: The gentle sighs of the wind created peaceful sughs in the forest.
meanings.sent2: I love the calming effect of listening to the sughs of the leaves in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mimicked the sughs of the trees to play a prank.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the sughs of the forest whispered secrets of the night.
meanings.sent5: The sughs of the trees enveloped me in a blanket of tranquility.

meanings.sent1: The wind gently sughed through the branches, creating a soothing melody.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the leaves sughing softly as the breeze passed through them.
meanings.sent3: The old house seemed to sugh with memories of days gone by.
